website_summaries.verdict: For the person who wants to keep their desk or nightstand tidy, this minimalist heater doesn't take up much space.
pros: Three options in size – 600, 950, or 1,200 watts
Safety features include: overheat and tip-over protection
Heats up rapidly (2 secs) and provides plenty of warmth
cons: Reports of lemons or of units no longer working after only a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Complete lemon!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box to use at work this week and it wouldn’t even turn on. Unfortunately missed my return window and my money just went down the drain. What crap!
customer_reviews.author: Schahara

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. I was sent two and neither one worked or even turned on. DONT waste your time or money on these. This is by far the WORST product I have purchased in amazon being a customer over 10 years and a very active one
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Good basic desktop heater
customer_reviews.text: My office is often freezing cold, so I bought this and initially set it up about 12-18 inches away from me on my desktop. It's *very* warm for its size and price, and I ended up moving it back a bit to get the right balance. Touch controls are nice. Our company safety department requires personal heaters have a tip-over shutoff feature, and this one passes no problem - tested it a few times and it's pretty sensitive to any tipping. The only thing I wish it had was adjustable temperature or fan speed settings. If it's too hot or cold for you, you just have to move it closer or farther.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mini heater for my desktop in my office. It can get quite chilly on cold days, but with the push of a button this little guy blasts out the heat! Ive had to turn it off at times because it works TOO well. The quality and overall look of the unit is perfect. Sleek looking, has a nice safety shutoff feature if for some reason it tipped over. I like the regular fan function as well - something not all mini space heaters have. Now in the summer when its hot I can still use it! Im glad I spent a little more money on this version because I couldnt be happier!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this space heater thinking that it was not going to be enough for my room, but boy was I wrong! I have been using the space heater for over two weeks now and it works perfectly. It is able to heat up my room within 15 minutes. It also has a sensor of which spots are colder and moves accordingly. It is also small and easy to carry. I can move it to the kitchen or to the living room if I really need to. I do wish the cord was a longer but honestly it is not a big deal. Great product and I will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact heater for the price (~$15)! It’s a little more powerful than other heaters of this size at 600W rather than 500W. The oscillation feature helps air circulation and it is noticeably warmer in a small room after just a few minutes. The anti-tip button on the bottom is nice as well as the little filter in the back. It’s not completely silent but not loud enough to bother me. Overall, it seems like a decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nekomancer

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful, and cute.
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as pictured! I’m a little curious to see what it’s durability is. When it rotates, the power cord also rotates with it so I think the wires may eventually wear out. Besides that it’s cute, compact, but still a powerful personal heater. It will not heat up an entire room (maybe it can if you don’t have drafts, but I have very leaky windows) but I can feel it about 4 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the desk or office.
customer_reviews.text: This heater's small size makes it perfect for your office and desk. Use it on top for your hands and body or under it to warm your feet and legs. It puts out plenty of heat for a smaller room, like an office or small bathroom. I like to use an extra heater in the bathroom in the winter. It allows the heat to be left on a lower setting yet the room and the floor to be warmer when you get out.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Pros: TINY!!!! I love the feature where it cuts over if it's tips over! Comes in handy when you have toddlers running all over the place. Has a feature that prevent the room from over heating Con It does not have a feature that allows you to pick a specific temperature that you'd prefer the room to be, but honestly the temperature that its set to automatically cut off on is perfect! I use the heater to warm up my feet under my desk at home
customer_reviews.author: Crissy lott

customer_reviews.title: Heat Galore!
customer_reviews.text: This mighty little heater that is perched on my office desk radiates far more heat in my office than my large space heater on my office floor that has now been decommissioned from service. The desk-top heater is quiet and attractive-looking. I could not be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and powerful for its size.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping my bare feet warm when I am changing of getting out of the shower. Though it’s small it’s powerful enough for my 10’x10’ bathroom. It makes it much more comfortable when I’m in there changing or just a little chilly and need to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great for a very small room or bathroom. Better as a personal heater under desk.
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the chill down in my sons small bedroom or their bathroom. It’d be a better personal heater under a desk or in a small confided area. Although my sons loved the “cool design” I don’t have much complaints considering I bought for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny but seems perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and I didn’t realize how small it would actually be! It’s TINY but the reviews say it’s perfect for a small space! I live in a motor home so we will see how this warms up my little living area! But the size seems great for what I’m needing! Added a photo of the size compared to a gallon of water. Will add more to my review when I use it!
customer_reviews.author: AllieG

customer_reviews.title: This lil baby pushes out tones of heat
customer_reviews.text: I keep this heater under my desk at work. While everyone else wraps blankets around themselves, I’m at my desk with my sweater hanging on my chair. This is perfect for any office large or small.
customer_reviews.author: rayna williams

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful space heater
customer_reviews.text: This space heater is small. It blows out good cool and hot air. Can heat up a small room. Kinda of a quiet fan. Its nice that it has a dust filter in back. I have no complaints about this fan now. My only concern is it might be difficult to open and clean inside when it start to get really dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: My office is next to a window at work so it get's pretty cold in the winter time. I was looking for a heater that would serve as a fan too since it can get pretty warm in the summer but that was still small enough that it wouldn't take up too much space. This does just that! It's cute and small but mighty! I only wish it had a remote so I could control it from my chair (I have it set under my desk by my legs so I have to get under my desk whenever I want to turn it off or on).
customer_reviews.author: Thalia Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: This fan is not worth paying for. You cant feel any air even 3 inches away. Trying to warm a small space, this will not work. I would definitely not purchase or recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: vjoyana

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 8 days before it went dead, bought a replacement (other brand) and that one has gone 3 months no issues. The touch button was really hard to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: 2000robot

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I get so chilly in one part of our room. This is perfect for my needs! Great that I can unplug and take in another room that we don’t use often with the handle on the back! Added touch, it has a oscillation button to share the heat
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was a very good space heater. Small and didn't output a lot of air, but still capable of warming the area very well. The safety feature that cuts power if the heater is knocked over is great. Unfortunately, it lasted only around 3 months. Worked just fine one day, and suddenly the next there's something wrong inside the case causing it to make weird noises along with being able to blow any air. It's unusable now.
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COMPACT HEATER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how efficient and effective this heater was. For it being so small & compact, it works like a big bulky heater! The cool fan feature is an added bonus and it cools quickly and pushes out a good amount of cool air for the space. It is perfect for my desk when I am working and I love the option of having the heater if I’m cold & being able to switch to cool if I’m too warm! I definitely will be getting another for another space in our home!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hammad

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for close up warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Reason I bought this was because my home A/C unit is broken, so for the winter I only needed a small space heater to feel a little warmer and this device is perfect. The heat does not reach very far but if close to it you will warm up quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Best for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Best heater for the bathroom. I spend a lot of time on the toilet. My bathroom is cinderblock and is pretty damn cold in the winter. This this roasts my legs off. I love it. Damn good heater for the cash
customer_reviews.author: Phormant

customer_reviews.title: Use it Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple months ago and I use it every day. As a person who gets cold easily I keep it in my cubicle and it can really warm you up. If it breaks I'll buy another one. Good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: D Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Fails quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater to put near my keyboard so that my fingers wouldn't get cold while at all work. It worked well for that purpose until it quit working all together. Intermittent use over less than 2 months and now it will not even power on. It was never dropped or moved from it's original position. I would recommend looking elsewhere for a small space heater.
customer_reviews.author: R kouz

customer_reviews.title: No temperature regulation cut off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blue small heater for my sons room. Works great. Have had it for 2 months now and still working. Was disappointed there was no temperature themostat cut off. So when it reaches a certain temp, it doesn't shut off. It will run constantly. As long as you have it on. Made my sons room into a sauna. But know that we know, it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: MyKatGrowlz

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was wanting to get a small countertop heater for my bathroom because it is frigid in the morning. This heater is easy to use, sleek looking, has a heat and normal air setting, and is not loud at all. Heat up my bathroom in a matter of minutes and when I stepped out of the shower I wasn't freezing. The only downside so far is that there is only one heat setting and although it warmed up a small bathroom, I doubt it would heat up anything larger. Overall good value product.
customer_reviews.author: jeup13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now. It is quite powerful when it comes to heat! It is small for the surface area it covers is slim but man it sure packs a warm punch! I love that it has not only a heat but a non heat setting. It is not necessarily a great fan but it does give off a bit of wind. The tip over off switch is handy too.. you know just in case! Have ZERO complaints here :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight & doesn't take up much space
customer_reviews.text: I like that it easily fits on my desk. I also like that if you even slightly move it that it shuts off. That is very important to me as I don't want to cause a fire. The osculating function is good as well so the heat doesn't just blast you in one spot and burn your skin.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Must be safe, it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It just didn't work for me. I don't know if the thermostat thought it was warm enough under my desk or if I got a defective one, returned it with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. Does not work if sitting on carpet. Must be on a hard wood floor. Needed for my mans man cave and haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap and safe heater as the slightest budge will turn itself off and it’s actually quite strong worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: luis peregrina

customer_reviews.title: How do you operate this thing...
customer_reviews.text: I could not find an on/off button or any buttons on the device so I would plugin the wall but can't operate!
customer_reviews.author: Rahil Vora

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Safety button on bottom to keep from accidental tipping while operating. Buttons on top are just pressure sensitive, so took me a minute to realize they were buttons....(I feel old now).
customer_reviews.author: M. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, no problems. Very happy to get an extra boost of heat without turning up the thermostat for the whole house. I have had this for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I love that it oscillates and produces either hot or cold air. It heats up very quickly, does not work on carpet though. I need to use it on its box or a flat surface in order to get it to turn on. If you bump it at all it switches off, making it very safe. Quit working after 2 months though. Tried using other outlets, turning it off and back on.. nothing. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: m.steffanina

customer_reviews.title: A lot of heat.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my end table next to where I sit and also to use in my camper van. I absolutely love this. Small, compact and puts a lot of heat out. Can’t wait to use in my camper van. I highly suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR WARMTH, THIS IS NOT THE PRODUCT FOR YOU. I hoped to warm my office room, which is smaller than a twin-sized bed. The product was about the size of my hand, weighs about the same. It produces a minimal amount of heat, up to a foot away from itself. I froze while this thing roared; it is very loud and very bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk top warmer
customer_reviews.text: It s not too loud, and the performance is very good. The rotating however does not work properly, because the heater starts sliding on smooth surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for the office!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this little guy is to use. I just plug it in, and press 2 buttons - and wala! heat! Love the safety features too. I accidentally kick this heater over a lot, and it's nice to know that it will always automatically shut off. I do wish there was a couple of options on temperature, though. Sometimes I don't want it so hot - but I will just push it a little further away from me. So not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: sveums

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater, almost silent
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for safety as my first priority when purchasing an electrical heater. I love the little knock over switch on the bottom of this heater. Great buy and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: azb

customer_reviews.title: Works well but I wish It had a temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I wish it had a high/low or temperature setting. We are using as supplemental heat in baby's room since it doesn't get very warm in there and honestly this space heater makes the room a little too warm. Our old space heater would turn off if it was getting too warm and restart as it got cooler. I wish this one did that as well. But otherwise it works.
customer_reviews.author: katie h

customer_reviews.title: Love it ( - ) the stupid tip over button
customer_reviews.text: Well I mean it heats FANTASTICALLY!! However the tipover button on the bottom broke and because of that it won't turn on only like 1.5 months after ownership. So. I mean, it could just be my luck but I really do like the efficiency and rotation of this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice, portable desk heater
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small heater for under my desk to keep my feet warm, as my office is on a concrete slab. With having computers, cords, cables, etc, I needed a small heater that had safety features as well. This is a great option that suited my needs and I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ToothChik

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Not much I can say....it works fine and puts out enough heat for my particular application.
customer_reviews.author: Art A

customer_reviews.title: Produces heat quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Compact heater that’s great for office or dorm room. It’s great that it oscillates, so that heat isn’t pointed in one direction. Very streamlined product—would purchase again. Delivery arrived exactly as described and faster than anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly small and discreet. We arent allowed heaters at work and this thing is perfect. Keeps my upper body nice and warm. It also has a cooling fan which I really dont use but comes in handy for those wanting something to blow cold air. I like to keep it in on position but it also has a circulating option.
customer_reviews.author: sweetmarlene213

customer_reviews.title: This portable heater warms up Quick! Powerful heater in a portable package
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this heater wondering how it would perform and it didn't disappoint. The heater warms up quickly, Oscillates and even operates as a fan. I put this in our bathroom for about 10 minutes and it warmed it up 2 degrees. I'd recommend this one to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors with Erik

customer_reviews.title: powerful little guy
customer_reviews.text: For being so small and compact, this heater puts out so much heat! Warms my office up so much i have to turn it off now and again.
customer_reviews.author: CHERISH CARUTHERS

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Puts out alot of heat. Also has just fan mode. Pivots. Safety features work great.
customer_reviews.author: michelle farrall

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Used only occasionally in my office (a couple days a week for a couple of hours at a time at the most). It has just completely stopped working. I've tried different outlets. It's definitely on a flat surface. It's just completely dead. Worked great when it worked, but I'm super annoyed that it only lasted for 2 months. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Effective
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for a small office space, which is what I purchased it for. It has a safety button underneath the base that shuts the unit off if it’s not on a flat surface. It can oscillate, or stay in one place. Just what I expected. Does the job. A little noisy, but not terribly loud.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is tiny but mighty! Its low energy but the amount of heat it puts out is great! I love the fact that it oscillates heating the room much faster. It's insanely cutesy! Also, I can use it in the hotter months because it has a cool/natural air function! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Deltastorm

customer_reviews.title: Not ETL listed.
customer_reviews.text: Title is inaccurate -- this item is not ETL listed. In fact it has no safety certifications whatsoever. That combined with a very unpleasant smell when opening it and flimsy looking tipover switch make me not trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Arya Popescu

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! I needed a space heater for work and this is perfect! It’s small so I can store it easily and it won’t take up much room. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ceesolo

customer_reviews.title: My hands are warm
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me working on my computer in a cool room. My hands are no longer like ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Arlette Childs

customer_reviews.title: Works great - for a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t last long at all, only 4 months with maybe once a week usage and always turning it back off. Worked great for a short time, wish I could fix it.
customer_reviews.author: MINDY MOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This heater/fan is pretty neat only downside is that it small so make sure you understand that when you buy it Updated: after a week of using this item broke. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is great! They are so responsive. Great for smaller places because it does not put out a lot of heat. I keep it under my desk at work to keep my feet warm at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Cute and waaaarm
customer_reviews.text: This sucker gets you warm quick and doesn't use so much power. I love it. Perfect for my office space at work.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Ling-Ling

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size product to use in my office space. The heat that comes out is great, and the safety feature is great when a lot of movement is around it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: how to operate
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this unit, I have been able but once to operate it while following printed instructions. I would welcome your input as I want to keep the unit. Thanks, David PS. One constructive comment...your heater needs to be more "customer friendly." Today,11-4, I would guess I tried about 24-25 times to engage the heater unit w/o success.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Gumlia

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for small rooms.
customer_reviews.text: I used this heater in the bathroom of my RV and it works great.!
customer_reviews.author: Damon mckerrell

customer_reviews.title: Great basic personal heater
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for my 200sqft 3(ish) season porch to keep my plants warm and comfortable over the winter. the oscillation setting is key - this product keeps my plants at the perfect temp and the safety features are good to have since I'm not always home. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Good space heater
customer_reviews.text: This is really good space heater to have on hand! Would be great for a cubicle type work space. I recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Destin Hogsed

customer_reviews.title: Great looking heater
customer_reviews.text: it looks and works great! and oscillates too!Nice and small too
customer_reviews.author: George Kosta

customer_reviews.title: What a great heater!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this heater! It's lightweight but it packs a punch. The weather here has been chilly and I was able to take the heater to the office with me to keep me nice and warm. My favorite feature is the ability to switch it to "fan mode" when I don't need the heating element. Great product and I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Quit working shortly after purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered two of these for my classroom. Worked great initially, esp with the way they rotate. However, one of them quit working after a couple days of use. I’m now questioning their quality.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Small, Quiet, and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a small product, easily fits under the desk at work. It shuts off if tipped over, warns a small space quickly, and is easy to use. The fan (cooling) doesn’t cool you down if you are feeling warm, but it does seem to be a good way to keep air circulating...which is needed in a small office area. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J@sPeR

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a really small but really warm heater. I got it to keep my bedroom warm and it does not disappoint. Took me a second to realise it has to be on a hard flat surface to turn on, but knowing it will turn off if it tips over for some reason is rather nice.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Small but Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with my purchase. At first, I was skeptical about purchasing a small heater for the price, but turns out it really does bring the heat. The only downside is that you can’t control the temperature like other higher end heaters but the size and power of this heater makes up for it. Also, the safety functions prevent my cat from causing mayhem.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. It’s so small and lightweight, I was pleasantly surprised at how well it heats.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: it dont work
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost my box came today and when I got it the package was open. The only thing I'm getting out of this heater is noise. Close up you feel the heat but far away Nothing
customer_reviews.author: LATOYA SIMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The device quit working after a few short months. That’s what I get for trying to go with the cheaper option. Use your cash for better quality. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost! It works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It works great to warm the feet as well as to use at the bathroom. Easy to carry and it warms up instantaneously. Safety button works as expected. It turns off as you incline it. The base could be a little heavier to keep still while in the rotation mode. Very happy with the acquisition for this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective little Hester
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this portable electric heater . It’s compact and lightweight and yet powerful and quiet too . I use it under my desk at work so my feet and legs will be warm . It does the job very nicely . I would highly recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and product arrived in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Small but does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: After I read instructions it was easy to get heat turned on.
customer_reviews.author: ChristmasCheer

customer_reviews.title: Great fast heating & safe feature
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great ordered monday received wensday . So far i really love this product from the quick heating & censor button instead of real buttons to it being light weight & very portable. My favorite feauture is the tilt feature . If it tilts it automatically turns off ! Not only that if its not straight it will not turn on . Will def purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heater
customer_reviews.text: Quick heat up time. It does only take about 2 seconds to heat up and warms a good size room in about 5-10 minutes. Definitely a hood buy for the price. The auto shutoff feature for tip over is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: jessie portillo

customer_reviews.title: Its Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! I got it a couple months ago within a week it stopped working I called and complained and was told that the next day it will be picked up no one ever came and I've been trying to get in contact with a seller but there is no way to. Don't buy this its a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Safe.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an under-desk heater in a small, unheated room with the 600W setting. It is more than adequate for my needs. It has a small tips under the unit. If my feet tips over heater, the fan will shut off. The unit is compact, portable and reasonably quiet. I should have purchased it much sooner. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Porter Price

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it after one day of use because Sparks were flying out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Xentrifuge

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: It is small but mighty. I was comfortable while watching football in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Smashley K

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heater is super cute. Will fit perfect on my desk. It even oscillates! Great little heater and great price. It works as a fan too!! Very happy with it. I had a great video but it wont upload. Sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful short distances, smells a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the table top of floor to keep my hands and face or feet warm. The chemical odor is extremely strong and obnoxious though, at times I had to turn it off and be cold because I couldnt stand the small.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase... Would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Here is my 2 cents on the fan!!! Bottom line would definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Goswami

customer_reviews.title: Lack of longevity
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice for approximately 30 minutes each time and this no longer works. To bad because it would have been great while le working at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Taft

customer_reviews.title: Good for small office or room
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my home office and worked very well. I highly recommend this product. Only issue is too much security of the product. It you don't put this heater on sturdy platform then it won't start. Also if you move it or if it tips over then it has automatic power cut off.
customer_reviews.author: Vinayak Ghodke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office or small area!
customer_reviews.text: Cute heater! And perfect for my office. Works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Djuana Sue Conner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed !
customer_reviews.text: I liked the compactness of the product. It is literally very light weight and extremely easy to use. I use it at my office desk and it seems to be a perfect thing for this kind of space.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit P.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SMALL HEATER
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small room/office. Heats up quick & can heat a whole room!! Safety feature on the bottom makes it easy for you to leave it running unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schussler

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great until it wasn't. I loved the oscillation features and the fact that it had both heat and cooling functions, just didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Lira

customer_reviews.title: Big heater in a little package
customer_reviews.text: This little heater is surprisingly powerful. It is the perfect size to put under or even on your desktop. Since this heater can also double as a fan I can get rid of my fan and just use this one. I highly recommend this for anyone who is looking for a compact personal heater that packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Got heater, plugged it in and doesn't turn on, tried the touch buttons and also doesn't work. I tried 6 other outlets in my house none worked!!! Why would you send such an item to me during winter??
customer_reviews.author: Tran Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter time!
customer_reviews.text: My family love the heater. It will come in handy once it start getting cold and my son's are in the bathroom getting out the shower and ready for school. We love that it rotates and it's small. It's perfect. The only thing is the cord isn't that long that's why I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty power of heat!
customer_reviews.text: I like the framework,the round design, more stylish than usual heater, the button is designed into the heater, so it has a flat cover. the heating coming out very quckly, no need extra time to pre-heat if you are too cold, perfect for personal use in winter, I would say this is an excellent gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Dorothea

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done just wish there was a feature to adjust the heat strength. Have to keep turning the unit on and off because it’s pretty strong. Otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Received this "mini" electric heater faster than expected. It was so easy to start using - set on flat surface, plug in, push button ... Voila - HEAT! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Neal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for one room heating.
customer_reviews.text: Use the heater in my bedroom at night. It’s small but powerful. Saving a ton of 💵 on my gas bill. My gas bill usually goes up about $100 during the fall/winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nagle

product_meta.title: Fitfirst Ceramic Space Heater, ETL Listed Portable Mini Desktop Heater Indoor Use, 2s Quick Heat-up, Ultra Quite, Auto-Oscillation for Office Table Home Dorm (600W)
feature_bullets: PERSONAL SPACE HEATER: PTC heating material, 600watts heat setting, warm air quickly within 2 seconds around you without overheating the entire house. Mini size provides effective, consistent warmth and won't get in the way, powerful but quiet heater, It's a must-have product in winter.

TIP-OVER&OVERHEAT PROTECTION: This ceramic heater can be used by all without any safety concerns. Automatically shut off if the space heater tips over or overheated inside the heater, bring you conveniences and peace of mind while reading, working, sleeping or watching TV.

AUTO OSCILLATION: SHOULD NOT be used in a wet or damp locations like bathroom. This heater can be set oscillate 45-degree right and left, covering 90 degree angles for multiple directions heating dispersal, Press the SWING button to heat a space more uniformly.

VERSATILE FOR ALL SEASONS: Simply choose the modes by smart touching, firstly press will start up the 600w heating function, red light will turn on. Second press blows natural wind, blue LED will be on, simply one more press for powering off. Meet you need to cooling and warmth.

PORTABLE HEATER WITH HANDLE: This portable personal heater offers a convenient carry handle that making it the perfect heater for taking with you wherever you go. Portable carrying handle behind the heater, easy to take it from the floor to the table or wherever it is needed the most.
